transcript:
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan hello. Haanji sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Hmm, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji, actually sir toh main aapko buylead kar rahi thi na sir usme correction ke liye na mere ko kuch update karne hai. Aapka ek product hai, jise digester tank. Theek hai? Aap uski na buylead toh mujhe hum kar rahe the lekin woh aapke catalog mein add nahi hai.
Customer: Toh aap usme karte hai digester tanks mein?
Executive: Haan, haan.
Executive: Aap karte ho isko main catalog mein add karwa du aapko? Kyunki aisa hota hai ki agar koi requirement aati hai toh woh aapke catalog mein show nahi hogi fir. Hai na? Toh uske liye aap woh consume kar rahe the lead. Baaki sir aapka na product hai, main aapko batati hu. Uska na price market standard ke according na correct nahi hai. Mere ko usme correction karni thi. Yeh jo aapka product hai, RCC shello construction works. Theek hai? Yeh square feet ke hisab se hota hai ya square meter ke hisab se hota hai?
Customer: Square meter hota hai.
Executive: Square meter hota hai na aur iska price kya rehta hai?
Customer: Yeh total amount hai. Total amount hai iska. Height aur diameter ke hisab se hota hai.
Executive: Okay, actually sir kya hai na ki aapne last time jo product isme price add kar rakha tha woh 72 lakhs hai. Toh itna hi rehta hai iska price?
Customer: Haan, kisi ka zyada bhi hota hai isse, kabhi kisi ka kam bhi hota hai. Jaise height kam hai, diameter chota hai toh thoda amount kam ho jayega.
Executive: Okay. Maximum price kitna rehta hai?
Customer: Maximum 40 lakhs hai.
Executive: Ek minute main na kar rahi hu. 40 lakhs.
Executive: Theek hai. Yeh square meter ke hisab se hota hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. And sir aapka last time maine ek product mein update kiye the, RCC lift wall structure wala. Iska jo aapne price bataya tha woh 45 lakhs tha. Yeh itna hi hai?
Customer: Haan, iska...
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Haan, height ke anusar hota hai, kam zyada.
Executive: Iska bhi actually sir aapka jo services ka kaam hai na isme bahut sari categories hoti hai. Starting price hi rehta hai.
Executive: Ji, jaise RCC structure construction service hai isme yeh bhi aata hai RCC frame structure services isme karte hai aap bhi?
Customer: RCC frame structure services mein? Nahi nahi, celliform shuttering work.
Executive: Haanji?
Customer: Celliform shuttering work.
Executive: Okay okay, theek hai. And isme aap ek ek aur aapka services mein add hai industrial RCC chimney construction services ka. Toh iska iska sir kya rehta hai? Matlab iska kya average rehta hai? Kyunki jo aapne price add kar rakhe hai na kuch market standard ke according hamare catalog mein woh reject ho rahe hai prices na. Toh mere ko update karne rahenge. Isme bhi kaafi sari services hamare paas aati hai. Jaise industrial chimney aati hai, commercial construction services aati hai. Toh aap isme karte hai inme se dealing? Industrial mein ya commercial mein?
Customer: Industrial mein.
Executive: Okay, industrial add kar deti hu. Aur is cheez ka price last time aapne bataya tha 35 lakhs. Isme kuch edit karna hai?
Customer: Hmm, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. And sir jo maine aapko WhatsApp kari thi na woh isiliye hum mis-understanding ho gayi thi. Kyunki aap us us jo services hai na uska aapko jo IndiaMART ka jo app hai aapko kya karna hai jo buylead ki option aati hai na jo aapko lagegi ki aapki services ke according aapko lead aa rahi hai aapko woh confirm karni hai. Baaki koi bhi aapko problem aati hai aap mere ko WhatsApp pe ek baar screenshot karke bhej dijiye send ki mam is cheez mein mere ko confusion aa rahi hai main aapki isme bhi help kar dungi. Baaki hota kya hai na sir ki maine call karke aapko update isiliye kiya hai because agar hamara catalog hi nahi hoga theek koi bhi buyer aapki profile pe aa raha hai uska proper description category add nahi hoti jaise aapka ek ek product ho raha hai usme bhi abhi category add nahi hai. Yeh hai sleep home RCC chimney construction services. Theek hai? Isme categories mein aati hai commercial building construction services aur aati hai RCC structure services. Isme karte hai aap inme se dealing? Commercial mein karte hai aap?
Customer: Nahi, commercial mein...
Executive: Commercial mein? Commercial mein nahi karte hai na? Yeh industrial mein aa gaya na?
Customer: Ji, industrial mein hi aata hai. Toh yeh wala iska kya rehta hai aapka ek aur service last mein add hai straight RCC chimney construction services.
Customer: Iska iska bhi thoda spelling galat hai.
Executive: Iska spelling galat hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isme yeh spelling hai sir straight RCC chimney iska kya rahega main check kar deti hu.
Customer: Estate estate RCC chimney.
Executive: Estate hai na? Straight nahi hai, estate hai.
Customer: Hmm, estate. Achha theek hai. Okay okay. Estate RCC chimney. Haan haan. Haan, celliform. Okay.
Executive: Estate RCC chimney. Okay. Iska sir price na aapne uske according kar rakha hai 40 lakhs.
Customer: Hmm. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Yeh standard price hai na?
Customer: Standard price hai.
Executive: Achha theek hai. Aur sir jo aapne us din hum bata rahe the aapne call kiya tha buy ka response toh unhone aapko callback nahi kiya uske baad koi?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Maine aapko lead theek hai. Koi baat nahi sir main iski update karke na aapko WhatsApp pe aur karwa dungi share aur jo bhi aapko response aayega toh aap share share kar dena mere sath, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's catalog not updated with digester tank.

- Product prices not aligned with market standards.

- Spelling mistake in 'Straight RCC chimney' service.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add digester tank to catalog.

- Executive offered to correct product prices.

- Executive confirmed the correct spelling is 'Estate'.

- Executive will share updates on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update catalog and share on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, pricing, spelling, services
